about_the_game:
Contains all content from DiRT Rally 2.0 Seasons 3 and 4, as well as the Colin McRae: FLAT OUT pack.

Add 6 challenging locations including Jämsä, Finland in rally and the Yas Marina Circuit, Abu Dhabi in rallycross.

Add 15 iconic rally and rallycross cars to your garage, including the Ford Focus RS Rally 2001 and the championship-winning Peugeot 208 WRX.
detailed_description:
Contains all content from DiRT Rally 2.0 Seasons 3 and 4, as well as the Colin McRae: FLAT OUT pack.

Add 6 challenging locations including Jämsä, Finland in rally and the Yas Marina Circuit, Abu Dhabi in rallycross.

Add 15 iconic rally and rallycross cars to your garage, including the Ford Focus RS Rally 2001 and the championship-winning Peugeot 208 WRX.

subs.option_text: DiRT Rally 2.0 - Year One Pass (Season1/2/3/4) - $19.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10

short_description: Contains all content from DiRT Rally 2.0 Seasons 3 and 4, as well as the Colin McRae: FLAT OUT pack. Includes three rally locations, three rallycross tracks and 15 cars.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
